channel.title: Rcpp on r-econometrics
channel.description: Recent content in Rcpp on r-econometrics

item.title: Short Notes on Bayesian Inference of Vector Autoregressive Models
item.description: During the past years I realised that econometric analyis can be understood as a craft. You learn your basics at school from more or less motivated/talented professors and then you are sent out into wild, where you are confronted with real life challenges that differ from the stylised exmples you have become used to during your studies. This comes with a bunch new insights that I want to document on this page. It should become a collection of notes on Bayesian VAR modelling that have become imporant to me over the last years.
